xuiChiclets
directive in module xui

Description

Control used to list groups of selected options.

Usage

as element:
<xui-chiclets
       auto-hide="{boolean}"
       clear-all-link-text="{string}"
       item-label-fn="{function}"
       items-source="{string[] | IMap<any[]>}"
       orientation="{string}"
       allow-clear-all="{boolean}"
       title="{string}"
       is-draggable="{boolean}">
</xui-chiclets>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
autoHideboolean

Expression to determine if the component is hidden when 'itemsSource' is empty.

(default: true)

clearAllLinkTextstring

Value to be shown as clear all link text.

(default: "Clear all")

itemLabelFnfunction

(itemId:string, groupId:string)=>string function returning item/group label based on given IDs.

itemsSourcestring[] IMap<any[]>

Either flat (string[]) or grouped (IMap) structure. If grouped, object properties are parsed as groups.

orientationstring

Can be set to 'vertical' to switch chiclets to vertical list mode.

(default: "horizontal")

allowClearAllboolean

Flag for 'clear all' link visibility.

(default: true)

titlestring

Value to be shown as chiclets title.

isDraggableboolean

Changes appearance of chiclets. PLEASE DO NOT USE, THIS FEATURE IS UNDER CONSTRUCTION. For more info see UIF-4341.

(default: false)
